name: Bladder Buster
description: You're on a pub crawl and need a piss.  Your score increases the more drunk and further you get, but the more you drink, the more you need to piss  Being drunk will also make the game harder as it randomizes controls and makes movement more janky.  Eat food to sober up.  Get as far as you can and be as drunk as possible before you piss yourself to get a high score .
